Unnamed: 9: A healthy diet for someone with diabetes is typically high in fiber and low in sugar. You should also limit your intake of saturated and trans fats.

Unnamed: 9: Exercise is important for everyone, but it’s especially important for people with diabetes. It helps your body use insulin more effectively. Just 30 minutes of moderate activity most days of the week can make a big difference.
